text: Hi, are you interest in making a donation called, Save the Children?
I don't know, what's it about?
Save the children is a charity for homeless children and food for these children.
That seems like a good cause.
Have you ever heard of Save the Children from friends or family.
The name sounds familiar, but I'm not sure where I heard of it.
You can donate any amount you like as much as $2.00.
Is it international? Does it help children all around the world?
Yes, you can donate to any child around the world, one child or a group of children.
Do you know what percentage of donations goes to overhead and what percentage directly goes to the child/children?
As far as i understand the entire amount goes to that cause.
But there has to be some overhead. Is it paid for by grants rather than donations?
no your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment any amount from $0.00 to $2.00.
Yes, I understand that, thanks.
I have been donating a little more than two years.
That's a good testimonial. But I don't have much money right now.
How does .25 sounds to you? less than a newspaper or a cup of coffee?
I disagree with your coffee price estimate. How about I donate 1 penny.
That sounds good. Thank you very much, every little is a help.
You're welcome, and thank you for your time.
